greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} C(n,k)*2^(k*(k+1)/2).
reference: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
results.author: _Colin Mallows_
ext: Formula and more terms from _Vladeta Jovovic_, Sep 20 2003
